column1: Smoque BBQ////I'm naturally pretty skeptical when it comes to BBQ places north of the Mason-Dixon line. More often than not you're paying a ton of money for mediocre food that merely serves as a reminder of what sort of thing you could be eating
column2: if only you weren't in the midwest. So
column3: when friends suggested we go to dinner at Smoque
column4: managed expectations seemed to be appropriate.
